snippet.title: Gambit Shifter - Trailer
snippet.description:
Gambit Shifter is a serene puzzler for chess experts and novices alike. Take control of just a single piece and traverse through levels where every move counts. Shift your form and unlock new, varied movements as you clear your path to the enemy King! 

The game includes 80+ hand-crafted levels, a focus-inspiring original soundtrack, and requires no prior chess knowledge.

Wishlist on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2331060/Gambit_Shifter/

#GambitShifter #indiegame #indiegames #indiegamedev #chess #chessgame #gameplay #gamedev #gamedevelopment #indiedev #chesspuzzle #chesspuzzles
